item.title: Part of high-rise apartment building in New York City collapses, no injuries reported
item.description: Part of a high-rise apartment building in New York City has collapsed, leaving a corner of the building in a pile of rubble

item.title: Livestock landscaping: Vermont ski areas employ goats and sheep to clear the slopes
item.description: Domestic goats are reaching new heights on Vermont's ski slopes

item.title: Walmart sets timeline for removing synthetic dyes, other additives from food brands
item.description: Walmart says it plans to remove synthetic dyes and 30 other food additives from its store brands sold in the United States by January 2027

item.title: Former judge is likely the next leader of the Mormon church and its 17 million members
5 homes collapse into the surf of the Outer Banks as hurricanes rumble in Atlantic
